snippet: Kristen Bell stars in “Veronica Mars,” a film partly paid for with funds raised on the website Kickstarter.
abstract: Kristen Bell stars in Veronica Mars film partly paid for with funds raised on crowdfunding website Kickstarter; some 91,000 donors contributed $5.7 million to revive cult television series after it was canceled in 2007, culminating in whirlwind 24-day film shoot, and leaving many wondering if success for campaign will lead to stampede of other similar projects.
lead_paragraph: Kristen Bell stars in “Veronica Mars,” a film partly paid for with funds raised on the website Kickstarter.

headline.main: ‘Veronica Mars’ Fans Are Happy to Finance a Reunion
headline.print_headline: ‘Mars’ Fans Are Happy to Finance a Reunion
